message.content:
Subject: Resignation - [Your Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inform you that I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be [Last Day of Work, e.g., June 30th].

Working at [Company Name] has been a valuable experience for me, and I appreciate the opportunities and support provided during my time here. I have learned a great deal from you and my colleagues, and I am grateful for the knowledge and skills I have gained.

Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist in the transition process. I will ensure that all ongoing projects are handed over smoothly and that any necessary documentation is completed before my departure.

Thank you again for your guidance and support during my time at [Company Name]. I wish you and the company continued success in the future.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
